prompts: Create a fluffy Normal-type Pokemon with light gray fur and a big bushy tail.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a small mammal, with big ears and a playful demeanor.
Generate a cute Pokemon that loves to play in grasslands and has a stylish appearance.
Design a Pokemon with a charming smile and distinctive whiskers, perfect for a family-friendly game.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies elegance and agility, with soft fur and a refined look.
Show me a tiny creature that can easily hide among flowers, featuring a delicate color palette.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that is known for its speed and charming personality.
